subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett had 10 strikeouts and tied for the major league lead with his 13th victory last night as the Boston Red Sox snapped a three-game losing streak with a 10-3 victory against the visiting Chicago White Sox.
snippet: Josh Beckett had 10 strikeouts and tied for the major league lead with his 13th victory last night as the Boston Red Sox snapped a three-game losing streak with a 10-3 victory against the visiting Chicago White Sox.
